mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.wupinguashi_id as wupinguashiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.wupinguashi_liuyan_text as wupinguashiLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,wupinguashi.wupinguashi_name as wupinguashiName ,wupinguashi.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,wupinguashi.status_types as statusTypes ,wupinguashi.wupinguashi_photo as wupinguashiPhoto ,wupinguashi.wupinguashi_time as wupinguashiTime ,wupinguashi.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,wupinguashi.wupinguashi_dizhi as wupinguashiDizhi ,wupinguashi.wupinguashi_content as wupinguashiContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM wupinguashi_liuyan a left JOIN wupinguashi wupinguashi ON a.wupinguashi_id = wupinguashi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.wupinguashi_id = #{params.wupinguashiId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.wupinguashi_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and wupinguashi.wupinguashi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiName},'%')
and wupinguashi.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and wupinguashi.status_types = #{params.statusTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wupinguashi.wupinguashi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.wupinguashiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wupinguashi.wupinguashi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.wupinguashiTimeEnd})
and wupinguashi.wupinguashi_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiDizhi},'%')
and wupinguashi.wupinguashi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
